benchmark_details.name: SmartBench
benchmark_details.overview: SmartBench is the first benchmark designed to evaluate the capabilities of on-device LLMs in Chinese mobile contexts, featuring 2973 question-answer pairs across five categories.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized framework for evaluating on-device LLMs in Chinese mobile scenarios.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: With advancements in technology, functions of on-device LLMs will evolve, and the current benchmark reflects capabilities up to December 2024.

data.source: Constructed from open-source datasets, manual collections, and generated pairs using LLMs.
data.annotation: Constructed using screening open-source datasets and manual collection.

methodology.calculation: Scores are assigned by an LLM (e.g. GPT-4 Turbo) that assesses responses against reference answers.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the model's performance in generating coherent and contextually appropriate responses.
methodology.validation: Evaluations conducted on multiple on-device LLMs across defined tasks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Licenses for open-source datasets used in benchmark are provided in the appendix.
